channel.title: My error
channel.description: [code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError at Player.appendPlayerAppearance(Player.java:747) at Player.appendPlayerUpdateBlock(Player.java:891) at PlayerHandler.updatePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:309) at client.initialize(client.java:13758) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:219) at server.main(server.java:49) Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 10919 at Item.<clinit>(Item.java:157) ... 6 more [/code] happens when i run. This happend after i deleted anything that needs to be there for silabsoft client -Tyrael-

item.title: My error
item.dc:creator: @Stanyer Stanyer
item.description:
@Stanyer wrote:

[quote=“w00d returns, post:3, topic:162461”]OMFG TYRAEL!!
Are you brining tyrael scape back?
It’s been so long since I’ve been on server/Seen you OMG.
I was admin on your server,I’m pretty sure I was head admin And Like the first player to log in lol,Remember I initiate I?

Fixing the error:
Open up shops.cfg
You see where it’s like
Npc id-----Shop name-----then there’s 2 numbers after,like 2-----2,You either have 1 too less or 1 too many,And if only a couple have 2 numbers backspace to one.
I know this is right because i’ve got this error before.[/quote]

He said he fixed it dipshit.

Read full topic
